requests.description:
Starts a phone call to a contact of yours*.

*NOTE: the contact must be listed in DJames' Vocabulary, in the Contacts tab!

Sends an SMS to a contact of yours*. Messaging language MUST be told if it's different from the contact's default.

*NOTE: the contact must be listed in DJames' Vocabulary, in the Contacts tab! Set there also the default messaging language for each contact.

To use emojis, say:

- 🇬🇧: "EMOJI" + smile / happy / grin / kiss / sunglasses / heart / sad / worried.

- 🇮🇹: "EMOJI" + sorriso / felice / sorrisino / bacio / occhiali da sole / cuore / triste / preoccupato.
Plays a song in Spotify from its album. Language MUST be told if the name is not in English. Preference is given to your saved tracks and to albums over singles.

requests.sentence: 🗣️  "Play a song in <language> from a playlist"
requests.description:
Plays a song in Spotify from a playlist of yours*. Language MUST be told if the name is not in English.

*NOTE: the playlist must be listed in DJames' Vocabulary, in the Playlists tab!

requests.intro: Play song from Liked Songs* context
requests.sentence: 🗣️  "Play a song in <language> from my liked songs / saved tracks / collection"
requests.description:
Plays a song in Spotify from your playlist Liked Songs*. Language MUST be told if the name is not in English.

*NOTE: this will work only for your most recently saved tracks!
Search & play an album in Spotify. Language MUST be told if the name is not in English.

Search & play the default playlist "This is <artist>" in Spotify, if it exists. Language MUST be told if the name is not in English.

If you add the word "Mix" after the artist name, DJames will search the Artist Mix playlist instead.

Plays any playlist* in Spotify. Language MUST be told if the name is not in English.

*NOTE: list your favourite playlists in DJames' Vocabulary, in the Playlists tab! Otherwise, DJames will search for playlist with that name across your Spotify.

requests.sentence: 🗣️  "Play my liked songs / saved tracks / collection"
requests.description: Plays your Liked Songs collection in Spotify.
